technology.short_description: Centuries of warfare have taught the Nagarythi the importance of slaughtering the Druchii from afar.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +1% per rank achieved
Missile damage: +5% for Shadow-walkers units
Weapon strength: +5% for Shadow-striders units

technology.short_description: Without fear the Asur charge into battle against their ancestral foe.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +1 per rank achieved
Missile damage: +5% for Shadow-walkers units
Weapon strength: +5% for Shadow-striders units

technology.short_description: Protectors of the sacred places of power within Avelorn as well as the Everqueen herself.

effects.description: Ward save: 2% for Alarielle

technology.short_description: Marksmanship skill is irrelevant when your target is obscured by shadow.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 1% per rank achieved

technology.short_description: With swift steps, the most practiced Shadow-walkers can reposition in an instant.

effects.description: Speed: +1% per rank achieved
Missile damage: +5% for Shadow-walkers units
Weapon strength: +5% for Shadow-striders units

technology.short_description: Ghyran blows strongest through the enchanted branches of the tree spirits.

technology.short_description: Being able to control your steed with only your knees frees up the hands for blade, point or bow.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Ellyrian Reavers, Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers, Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
Reload time reduction: +15% for Ellyrian Reaver Archers units

technology.short_description: Minor nobles often choose a patron from more prestigious quarters, swearing allegiance to their house.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Ellyrian Reavers, Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
Charge bonus: +10 for Ellyrian Reavers, Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units

technology.short_description: It is both the right and duty of Ulthuan's perfect cavalry to repeat the achievements of their glorious ancestors.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25% for Ellyrian Reavers, Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
Missile resistance: 10% for Ellyrian Reavers, Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units

technology.short_description: An eagle's senses match their speed in flight, making them excellent spotters and swift killers.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 for Great Eagle and War Lion units
Speed: +10% for Great Eagle, White Lions of Chrace and War Lions units
Melee attack: +4 for Great Eagle and War Lion units

technology.short_description: Thundering at dawn, the horn of the Hunter God heralds a bountiful hunt; keening at dusk, it portends lurking evil, warding all His children.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +2% for Sisters of Avelorn, Great Eagle, War Lions of Chrace, White Lions of Chrace and Lion Chariots of Chrace units
Physical resistance: 10% for War Lions of Chrace, White Lions of Chrace and Lion Chariots of Chrace units

technology.short_description: The maidens of Avelorn invoke the lands which they protect, and Isha, the Mother, answers.

effects.description: Ammunition: +20% for Sisters of Avelorn and Handmaiden of the Everqueen units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Sisters of Avelorn and Handmaiden of the Everqueen units
Attribute: Charge Defence vs Large for Sisters of Avelorn units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

technology.short_description: When a course takes several centuries to complete, you can be sure that its students know their subject inside and out.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +4 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

technology.short_description: One gifted to interpret the firmament’s signs and heed the wing-borne tidings of Morai-Heg's messengers may weave the skeins of fate.

effects.description: Battle reinforcement time: -30%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +30%

technology.short_description: The Asur regard the patronage of Loec with trepidation – his mirthful guise forever shadowed by the vindictiveness and trickery it conceals.

effects.description: Ambush success chance: +10%
Ambush defence chance: +10%

technology.short_description: Founded under Bel-Korhadris, the White Tower codified the Elven aptitude for magic into disciplines that pushed the boundaries of sorcery.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

technology.short_description: To contemplate the Elves' most brilliant enchantment is to deepen one's attunement to magic – and to risk joining the black-robed magisters in its eternal conjuration.

effects.description: Spell intensity: +10%

technology.short_description: Ancient techniques uncovered by our smiths clad our revered allies in starmetal plate.

effects.description: Unit mass: +20% for Dragon and Dragon Princes units

Ward save: 10% for Dragon Princes units

technology.short_description: With grim resolve and endless vigilance, Eltharion's forces patrol Tor Yvresse and push the green tide deeper into the foul badlands.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
